name: Sky's blue color (you can't move)
description:
You can't move but at least you can look around at all the buildings I did :'^)I don't have idea why is he standing like that but is the only way the camera moves around.

This is my final project, it's unfinished but I had  problems with unity and very little time. It's supposed to be settled on a post-apocaliptic world where the poor are in a big suburb breathing pollutionand barely see the sunlight and the rich live inside the great skytree. I planned this final project to have a character you could move around but I cant even do that.

(I wont tell anything else about the story because I dont want to spoil anything in case I finish this as a complete game someday ^^)
